meanings.sent1: She relists the groceries before going to the store.
meanings.sent2: He always relists his tasks to stay organized.
meanings.sent3: The teacher relists the homework, causing the students to groan.
meanings.sent4: The detective relists the suspects in his mind, searching for the culprit.
meanings.sent5: The chef relists the ingredients, ensuring nothing is forgotten.

meanings.definition: To make a new list of items previously listed
meanings.sent1: After losing the first list, she relists the names of the guests.
meanings.sent2: He relists the books he wants to read in a fresh notebook.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful traveler relists his packing items multiple times.
meanings.sent4: The librarian relists the borrowed books, keeping track of returns.
meanings.sent5: The scientist relists the observations, eager to analyze them further.
